content.description: Start as for (Exhaustion Roof) and climb it to the lip. Then traverse the lip to the left arete and thug your way to the top before you're completely wasted.

Sit Start on low crimp rail, work way up face, topout on incut jug.

youtu.be/y2dkDuvK0AM
content.location: Standalone problem, looks like flying saucer. Before the hill down to Banana Hands.

content.description: Classic problem in this area. Start matching the undecling then go right and lock your knee for rich the crimp then jump to the jug, sit star it's a little harder
content.location: On the trail 100 feet after the Coliseum

content.description: Start on lowest rails on the face, pull up nice edges to the lip, go right or straight up and top out.
content.location: Just down the trail after Banana hands, before Energy or Gaults Roof. Cliffside collapsed around the entrance so it's dark in there - don't forget a light!

content.description:
Start low left side of boulder on massive undercling.  Reach right hand out into vertical crack, left hand up to bad sloper.  Make some foot movements to get set up.  Either bump right hand out high to bad slimper or make big almost jump to the ledge.

 Found this old video on youtube- only way I know the name of this.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hzpwhyNH4ts
content.location: Next major area down from Colosseum.  On the left side of the corridor that the path leads through.

content.description: Start on two finger pockets all the way to the left under the prow, work up pockets with a heel or toe hook, then heel hook the lip and fire off to the jug.
content.protection: Three Pads, Spotter for last move.
content.location: Just down the trail from Strawberry Shortcake, slightly up the hill on the cliff line, before you hit Energy or Gault's Roof.

content.description: Sit start on lowest crimp rail with matched hands, pull up to right pocket, hike up feet - then pull same moves as rebel stand.
content.location: In Colosseum, right of gladiator, left of squirrel master.

content.description: Start on two horizontal crimps under roof, climb straight out on crimps to jug, topout.
content.location: right most roof line on the satellite boulder past banana hands.

content.description: Tombstone sized flake ripped off face - now small crimps are left. Sit start on left obvious low rail, pull up crimps, throw for jug ledge and top out. Classic sandstone power bloc.
content.location: Obvious face behind the large boulder next to Gladiator/Rebel area. 10 feet behind the v0 slabs.

content.description: Start sit on the left arete and a crimp for the right hand then fly up the corner
Start sit under the roof on a jug
content.location: One of the last boulders on this area, follow the trail to the ends

content.description:
Gault Roof deserves more climbs. Here's another great one. Top needs a little bit more cleaning but is totally good to go for more sends! First ascent was done as a flash. 

 Start with left hand on the lip and right hand under the roof on lowest good right hand crimp. Jump doubles heals up and power your way out right compressing some very unique holds. Top out up and a little right.
content.location: Right of Gault Roof by about 5 feet

content.description: Sit start in the back of the roof on good holds. Climb straight out the roof on good holds/jugs to a big sloper at the lip. Mantle your way through the crux to the top.
content.location: Instead of going climbers right along cliff to all the boulders, go climbers left. From the Cliff Break Trail, go climbers left for about 100 yards till you see the roof. Hope this works.

content.description: Very cool climbing, start sit on the right side of the boulder on a jug, go up and traverse left to a low jug on the left side then go up on a small crimp and a bad pinch and go up straight
there is may ways up very fun.
content.location: it is to the right from all of the rope climbs.

content.description: Start with right hand in head high pocket, use small features for left hand, pull to mono pocket intermediate - or go straight to the ledge and topout.
content.location: In Colosseum to the right of gladiator, and left of squirrel master.

content.description: Start sit in the center of the small face under the overhang and climb up the buddha
content.location: The first boulder you see as you walk down to the cliff on the main trail

content.description: Start sit on a jug then go up and right
content.location: On the left face of Banana hands

content.description: Start sit on a jug under the the vertical crack, go left on the longitudinal crack then long rich to a small and slope crimp, match and throw to a slope then go left and climb up
content.location: On the trail 50 feet after Todo bueno

content.description: Starting list of problems at Squirrel Rock, til we make boulder pages.
